## âœ… Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the Swift style guide
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed any debug code or console logs

### Functionality
- [ ] The app builds successfully (`./build.sh`)
- [ ] All existing features still work correctly
- [ ] New features work as expected
- [ ] No performance regression

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated comments in the code
- [ ] I have updated CONTRIBUTING.md if the contribution process changed

### License Compliance
- [ ] I confirm my contributions will be licensed under Personal Use License (Non-Commercial)
- [ ] I acknowledge that Sergio BaÃ±uls retains copyright as the original author
- [ ] I confirm this contribution is for non-commercial purposes
